Department of Creative Artificial Intelligence
==============================================

The Creative AI Department is a cross-disciplinary unit merging industrial design, applied sciences, education, real estate, surveying, and safety management. With a core focus on integrating Artificial Intelligence (AI), the department explores innovative applications in smart industrial design, applied sciences, geospatial technology, education, real estate and architectural intelligence, and safety management practices. The overarching objective is to pioneer intelligent solutions that enhance functionality, creativity, and safety across diverse fields, ultimately shaping a future where AI-driven advancements redefine possibilities and elevate user experiences.

##### Niche Area

**Applied AI in the Following Area : Metavers | Industrial Design | Creative Industries (e.g. Creation, Information Analysis, Content, Enhancement and Post, Production, Information Extraction and Compression) | AR/ VR/ MR | Graphic Design**
